paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A TTR V122I variant (found in 3%–4% of Black individuals) may promote amyloid fibril deposition, leading to heart failure.
A TTR V122I variant (found in 3%–4% of Black individuals) may promote amyloid fibril deposition, leading to heart failure.
A TTR V122I variant (found in 3%–4% of Black individuals) may promote amyloid fibril deposition, leading to heart failure.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with destabilization of the TTR-RBP4 complex.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is linked to heart failure through amyloid fibril deposition.
key_quotes: A TTR V122I variant (found in 3%–4% of Black individuals) may promote amyloid fibril deposition, leading to heart failure.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
